OM_Laezel_COM.synopsis:
Kithrak Voss, the knight hunting Lae'zel, rides in on a dragon and kills flaming fist on a bridge. Lae'zel approaches, thinking he might lead her to a creche, where she can bec ured of the tadpole.

SVoss is spoiled, intelligent, and creepily calm and fatherly: Joaquin Phoenix in Gladiator. Smarmy and evil sounding. Pronunciation: Qudenos = cue-DAY-noss. Ghaik = GAYK. Kith'rak = KITH-rack. Lae'zel = lay-ZELL. Vlaakith = VLAH-kith.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM.synopsis:
Kithrak Voss, the knight hunting Lae'zel, rides in on a dragon and kills flaming fist on a bridge. Lae'zel approaches, thinking he might lead her to a creche, where she can bec ured of the tadpole.

SVoss is spoiled, intelligent, and creepily calm and fatherly: Joaquin Phoenix in Gladiator. Smarmy and evil sounding. Pronunciation: Qudenos = cue-DAY-noss. Ghaik = GAYK. Kith'rak = KITH-rack. Lae'zel = lay-ZELL. Vlaakith = VLAH-kith.

OM_Laezel_COM_34.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_34.text: Rider - my time is short. Lead me to...
OM_Laezel_COM_34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel begins to bow as she speaks to the kith'rak

OM_Laezel_COM_74.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_74.text: Were I not merciful, I would slice the skin clean from your meat.

OM_Laezel_COM_11.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_11.text: Yet you are not bleeding. For I am nothing if not merciful.

OM_Laezel_COM_92.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_92.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rak

OM_Laezel_COM_8.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_8.text: You will call me Jhe'stil Kith'rak.
OM_Laezel_COM_8.context: NodeContext: zhe-STIL KITH-rack. (First consonant like the first letter of 'Jacque'.)

OM_Laezel_COM_50.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_50.text: Voss, Knight Supreme. The queen's silver, the queen's sword.

OM_Laezel_COM_28.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_28.text: A ghaik vessel has fallen from the sky, Lae'zel. Thieves aboard have taken a weapon most precious.

OM_Laezel_COM_79.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_79.text: It is polyhedric in shape, and inscribed with the sacred runes of our people.

OM_Laezel_COM_49.speaker: Narrator
OM_Laezel_COM_49.text: *You feel Shadowheart's anxiety. The weapon that Voss seeks is the same one the Absolute's followers are hunting - it's the artefact that she carries.*
OM_Laezel_COM_49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steals a glance to Tav, her expression tight, apprehensive. The image of her undulates slightly - a mindmeld.InternalNodeContext: This node if the 'find the weapon' beat was previously delivered by Dror Ragzlin

OM_Laezel_COM_40.speaker: Narrator
OM_Laezel_COM_40.text: *You feel Shadowheart's anxiety. The weapon that Voss seeks - it's the artefact that she carries.*
OM_Laezel_COM_40.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steals a glance to Tav, her expression tight, apprehensive. The image of her undulates slightly - a mindmeld.

OM_Laezel_COM_9.speaker: Narrator
OM_Laezel_COM_9.text: *Her mind focuses - the giths' suspicion cannot be aroused. They cannot discover that the weapon they seek is right within their grasp.*
OM_Laezel_COM_9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's eyes flick over to the hobgoblin.

OM_Laezel_COM_56.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_56.text: Take word to your crèche. You are to join our search.
OM_Laezel_COM_56.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Pause after the line. Camera shows Lae'zel for a second or so. She is still bowed, silent, frowning.|

OM_Laezel_COM_18.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_18.text: Speak up, child. Affirm your mandate.

OM_Laezel_COM_91.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_91.text: Mouth a silent command to Lae'zel: 'truth'.

OM_Laezel_COM_61.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_61.text: My mandate, Jhe'stil Kith'rak, is to locate this crèche. I was infected aboard a ghaik ship and need to be purified. Your mandate is to aid me.
OM_Laezel_COM_61.context: NodeContext: Snotty and confident, stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rak zhe-STIL KITH-rack. (First consonant like the first letter of 'Jacque'.)

OM_Laezel_COM_33.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_33.text: Purified? Soon, your skin will go grey, and your blood will run silver. You will shed your skin to become ghaik.

OM_Laezel_COM_7.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_7.text: Only in death are the infected cleansed.

OM_Laezel_COM_15.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_15.text: Baretha, see that her skull is split and the tadpole crushed. Then examine her corpse. I will take word to the Undying Queen - our search continues.

OM_Laezel_COM_73.speaker: Narrator
OM_Laezel_COM_73.text: *A current of deception carries Voss' words. Wherever he flies, it is not to Vlaakith.*

OM_Laezel_COM_17.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_17.text: Mouth a silent command to Lae'zel: 'play along'.

OM_Laezel_COM_59.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_59.text: You honour me with this duty, Kith'rak. I shall alert my caretaker with haste.
OM_Laezel_COM_59.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rakNodeContext: Barely holding back contempt

OM_Laezel_COM_52.speaker: Narrator
OM_Laezel_COM_52.text: *The Kith'rak nods, content with Lae'zel's answer.*
OM_Laezel_COM_52.context: CinematicNodeContext: Kithrak voss should nod here.

OM_Laezel_COM_3.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_3.text: You serve your queen well, child. Take your slaves, and hunt those who escaped the ghaik ship. They must carry the weapon.

OM_Laezel_COM_37.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_37.text: I fly now to Vlaakith, our Undying Queen. She will see your faith rewarded in this plane and ours.

OM_Laezel_COM_31.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_31.text: You serve your queen well, child. Hunt those who escaped the ghaik ship. Find the weapon.

OM_Laezel_COM_63.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_63.text: Lae'zel. Child. Your lies sting. Has Vlaakith not demanded better?

OM_Laezel_COM_44.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_44.text: Vlaakith demands my purity, Kith'rak. I was infected aboard a ghaik ship. By protocol you must aid me.
OM_Laezel_COM_44.context: CinematicNodeContext: stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rakNodeContext: Contemptuous,

OM_Laezel_COM_23.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_23.text: You were on the nautiloid? Then you are a ghaik wearing githyanki skin.

OM_Laezel_COM_13.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_13.text: Bend your head for the sword.

OM_Laezel_COM_86.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_86.text: I have done no wrong, kith'rak.
OM_Laezel_COM_86.context: NodeContext: looks up from bowing as she speaks

OM_Laezel_COM_90.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_90.text: Baretha, see that her skull is split and her corpse examined, on Vlaakith's command. I will take word to the Undying Queen - our search continues.

OM_Laezel_COM_35.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_35.text: Produce the odd artefact. You're looking for this, I take it?

OM_Laezel_COM_88.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_88.text: Our thieves come forth, Baretha. Did you imagine such fortune?

OM_Laezel_COM_20.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel looks up from bowing at the player in anger

OM_Laezel_COM_1.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_1.text: You will give us the weapon. Then you will bend your head for the sword.

OM_Laezel_COM_16.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_16.text: I have done no wrong. Vlaakith demands my purity, Kith'rak. I was infected aboard the ghaik ship. By protocol, you must aid me.

OM_Laezel_COM_4.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_4.text: Baretha, see that her skull is split and the weapon collected. I will take word to Queen Vlaakith - our quest has ended.

OM_Laezel_COM_65.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_65.text: I have my own mandate. Time to die, gith.

OM_Laezel_COM_77.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_77.text: What? Half-wit! I have not suffered for you to deny me!
OM_Laezel_COM_77.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel looks up from bowing at the player in anger

OM_Laezel_COM_64.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_64.text: You do not control your slaves?

OM_Laezel_COM_2.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_2.text: Baretha - see their skulls split and their corpses examined, on Vlaakith's command.

OM_Laezel_COM_85.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_85.text: I will take word to Queen Vlaakith - our search continues.

OM_Laezel_COM_36.speaker: Narrator
OM_Laezel_COM_36.text: *You realise that the weapon Voss speaks of is the gith artefact you carry. You must keep it from him, just as you must keep it from the Absolute.*
OM_Laezel_COM_36.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the 'find the weapon' beat was previously delivered by Dror Ragzlin

OM_Laezel_COM_29.speaker: Narrator
OM_Laezel_COM_29.text: *You realise that the weapon Voss speaks of is the gith artefact you carry. You cannot let him discover it - no matter what.*

OM_Laezel_COM_0.speaker: Narrator
OM_Laezel_COM_0.text: *You suddenly feel a strange anxiety take hold - not your own, but that of the artefact you carry. Somehow, it's afraid...*
OM_Laezel_COM_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player glances to their side, as if sensing the box

OM_Laezel_COM_53.speaker: Narrator
OM_Laezel_COM_53.text: *You attune your mind to it. The artefact does not want to fall into the gith raiders' hands any more than it does the Absolute followers'.*
OM_Laezel_COM_53.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the 'find the weapon' beat was previously delivered by Dror Ragzlin

OM_Laezel_COM_84.speaker: Narrator
OM_Laezel_COM_84.text: *You attune your mind to it. The artefact does not want to part from you. It does not want to fall into the gith raiders' hands.*

OM_Laezel_COM_72.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_72.text: I will be speaking on my kin's behalf, Kith'rak.

OM_Laezel_COM_30.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_30.text: I will be speaking on her behalf, gith.

OM_Laezel_COM_25.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel looks up from bowing at the player in anger

OM_Laezel_COM_26.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_26.text: Now, now - Vlaakith esteems all her children. What say you, githyanki?

OM_Laezel_COM_47.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_47.text: Now, now - I would hear from all dwellers of remote planes. What say you?

OM_Laezel_COM_70.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_COM_70.text: Now, now - I've few chances to speak to such an unusual sort. What say you?

OM_Laezel_COM_19.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_19.text: I will be speaking on her behalf, gith.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_38.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_38.text: Rider - my time is short. Lead me to...
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_38.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel begins to bow as she speaks to the kith'rak

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_101.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_101.text: Were I not merciful, I would slice the skin clean from your meat.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_32.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_32.text: Yet you are not bleeding. For I am nothing if not merciful.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_46.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rak

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_78.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_78.text: You will call me Jhe'stil Kith'rak.
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_78.context: NodeContext: zhe-STIL KITH-rack. (First consonant like the first letter of 'Jacque'.)

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_109.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_109.text: Voss, Knight Supreme. The queen's silver, the queen's sword.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_45.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_45.text: A ghaik vessel has fallen from the sky, Lae'zel. Thieves aboard have taken a weapon most precious.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_130.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_130.text: Take word to your crèche. You are to join our search.
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_130.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Pause after the line. Camera shows Lae'zel for a second or so. She is still bowed, silent, frowning.|

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_80.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_80.text: Speak up, child. Affirm your mandate.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_86.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_86.text: My mandate, Jhe'stil Kith'rak, is to locate this crèche. I was infected aboard a ghaik ship and need to be purified. Your mandate is to aid me.
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_86.context: CinematicNodeContext: stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rakNodeContext: Snotty and confident,

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_2.text: Purified? Oh, Lae'zel - why must the truth be so bitter? Soon, your skin will go grey, and your blood will run silver. You will shed your skin to become ghaik.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_122.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_122.text: Only in death are the infected cleansed.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_136.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_136.text: You will give us the weapon. Then you will bend your head for the sword.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_47.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_47.text: Stand down, knight. I do not have what you seek!

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_140.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_140.text: Baretha, see that her skull is split and the tadpole crushed. Then examine her corpse. I will take word to the Undying Queen.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_79.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_79.context: NodeContext: Smarmy and evil sounding. Tears = the tears you cry

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_50.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_50.text: My time is short, rider. We must speak.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_132.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_132.text: Sh-sh-shh. You interrupt an honoured kith'rak?

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_53.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_53.text: Were I not merciful, I would slice the skin clean from your meat.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_116.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_116.text: Yet you are not bleeding. For I am nothing if not merciful.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_81.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_81.text: I am called Lae'zel, Champion-Elect of the Six Arms of Tun'arath.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_70.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_70.text: You will call me Jhe'stil Kith'rak.
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_70.context: NodeContext: zhe-STIL KITH-rack. (First consonant like the first letter of 'Jacque'.)

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_96.speaker: Narrator
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_96.text: *You know of this man. He is Voss, Knight Supreme, a legendary warrior revered among the githyanki people.*

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_9.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_9.text: A ghaik vessel has fallen from the sky, Lae'zel. Thieves aboard have taken a weapon most precious.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_4.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_4.text: It is polyhedric in shape, and inscribed with the sacred runes of our people.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_18.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_18.text: Take word to your crèche. You are to join our search.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_44.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_44.text: Speak up, child. Affirm your mandate.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_108.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_108.text: Kith'rak, I seek purification. I have been infected aboard a ghaik vessel.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_123.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_123.text: Purification? Oh, Lae'zel - why must the truth be so bitter? Soon, your skin will go grey, and your blood will run silver. You will shed your skin to become ghaik.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_49.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_49.text: Purification? Why must the truth be so bitter, young one? Soon, your skin will go grey, and your blood will run silver. You will shed your skin to become ghaik.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_112.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_112.text: Only in death are the infected cleansed.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_23.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_23.text: Baretha - see that her skull is split and the tadpole crushed, on Vlaakith's command.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_104.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_104.text: The search continues. I will take word to the Undying Queen.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_72.speaker: Narrator
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_72.text: *A current of deception carries Voss' words. Wherever he flies, it is not to Vlaakith.*

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_10.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_10.text: I do not hail from this land, but from Crèche K'liir.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_135.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_135.text: Crèche K'liir? You are far from the Tears, Lae'zel. Does the caretaker let you stray so far?
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_135.context: NodeContext: Tears, as in tears that come from your eyes. A reference to the Tears of Selune, the asteroid belt in which creche k'liir is located.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_95.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_95.text: I've come to fulfil my final test: collecting a mind flayer's head.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_29.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_29.text: Then your test is delayed - your queen issues a new command.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_115.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_115.text: I fly now to Vlaakith, our Undying Queen. She will see your faith rewarded in this plane and ours.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_144.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_144.text: Kith'rak, I seek purification. I have been infected aboard a ghaik vessel.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_11.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_11.text: You test my temper, young one. Now tell me your purpose, while you can still breathe.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_94.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_94.text: My crèche has asked me to learn of local customs.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_76.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_76.text: Then your mission is delayed - your queen issues a new command.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_103.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_103.text: Crèche K'liir? You are far from the Tears. Does your caretaker let you stray so far?

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_41.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_41.text: I will deliver the message as you command.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_6.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_6.text: You serve your Queen well, child. Take your slaves, and hunt those who escaped the ghaik ship. They must carry the weapon.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_20.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_20.text: I fly now to Vlaakith, our Undying Queen. She will see your faith rewarded in this plane and ours.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_61.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_61.text: You serve your queen well, child. Hunt those who escaped the ghaik ship. Find the weapon.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_57.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_57.text: Sweet child. Your lies sting. Has Vlaakith not demanded better?

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_42.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_42.text: The truth, Lae'zel, before you stretch my mercies thin.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_119.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_119.text: The truth, before you stretch my mercies thin.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_17.text: Produce the odd artefact. You're looking for this, I take it?

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_28.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_28.text: Our thief comes forth, Baretha. Did you imagine such fortune?

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_92.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_92.text: See that her skull is split and her corpse fully examined. I will take word to the Undying Queen.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_102.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_102.text: Enough. I've been infected aboard a ghaik vessel and require purification.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_131.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_131.text: Purification? Oh, child - why must the truth be so bitter? Soon, your skin will go grey, and your blood will run silver. You will shed your skin to become ghaik.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_52.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_52.text: Only in death are the infected cleansed.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_100.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_100.text: Your silence is a dagger in Vlaakith's heart.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_138.speaker: Narrator
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_138.text: *He moves his hand in a quick flurry of gestures.*
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_138.context: CinematicNodeContext: The knight moves his hands - detect thoughts animations

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_40.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_40.text: Quickly read the meaning of his gestures.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_65.speaker: Narrator
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_65.text: *You realise he is casting Detect Thoughts.*

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_5.text: Allow him access to your mind.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_142.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_142.text: Will yourself to resist his probing.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_21.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_21.text: You close yourself to me, child? Such delightful hubris. The nation is stronger for it.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_124.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_124.text: A ghaik vessel has fallen from the sky. Thieves aboard have taken a weapon most precious.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_1.text: Take word to your crèche. You are to join our search.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_60.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_60.text: You cannot stay silent, child. Affirm your mandate.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_77.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_77.text: My mind is my own, kith'rak. I will have your head!

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_105.speaker: Narrator
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_105.text: *The gestures mean nothing to you - some sort of spell that you don't recognise.*

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_30.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_30.text: What is this? You travelled aboard the ghaik ship. You seek purification.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_55.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_55.text: Why must the truth be so bitter, young one? Soon, your skin will go grey, and your blood will run silver. You will shed your skin to become ghaik.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_85.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_85.text: Only in death are the infected cleansed.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_91.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_91.text: Enough games. You will die by my hand!

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_0.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_0.text: Tsk'va! Baretha - split her skull. If she carries the weapon, see to its safety. I must fly to Vlaakith.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_19.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_19.text: Allow the esteemed kith'rak to continue.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_12.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_12.text: ...name yourself, on command of our queen.
